articles.author: Mike Wall
articles.title: Europe’s Proba-3 satellites will launch early Dec. 4 to create artificial eclipses in space. Watch the liftoff live - Space.com
articles.description: Launch is scheduled for 5:38 a.m. EST on Wednesday (Dec. 4).
articles.content:
A European mission that will use two satellites to create artificial eclipses in Earth orbit will launch early Wednesday morning (Dec. 4), and you can watch the action live.

articles.title: Barnier makes last-ditch effort to prevent government collapse - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “The moment is serious and difficult, but the challenge is not impossible,” the French prime minister said in a television interview.
